item.title: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5 on PC with TeknoParrot
item.description: This truly is an exciting news! You can actually play modern arcade titles on PC with TeknoParrot. In this article, i am going to show how to use TeknoParrot to play one of my favourite arcade titles, Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5.

item.title: A Guide To Piracy
item.description:
Before you begin to plunder the Seven seas, you must prepare for all those traps and horrifying DMCA. Fret not! This article shall help you in your journey.

Updated: 25th March 2019

This post will be updated slowly. If you have any recommendations do comment down below.

item.title: 10/12-bit x265 encoding with Handbrake
item.description:
You may have seen x265 releases in the net and be suprised with the quality and size of those movies/tv-shows compared to the old x264. You might be wondering - How do i encode all those Blu-rays i got into x265 for storage?

That’s when Handbrake comes in handy! You can easily encode any movies into x265 or even other formats (i.e mp4, mkv, mov and etc).
